chapter.text: saaghan jadeul-ui yeonghon-eul ganglyeoghage kkeul-eoganeun cheonsadeul-eul dugo maengse hasa
chugbogbad-eun jadeul-ui hyeonghon-eul budeu leobge indohaneun cheonsadeul-eul dugo maeng sehamyeo
gyesileul jeondalhaneun cheonsaleul dugo maengsehamyeo
gyeongjuhayeo indohaneun cheonsadeul-eul dugo maengsehamyeo
hananim-ui myeonglyeongdeul-eul suhaenghaneun cheonsadeul-eul dugo maengsehanani
eoneunal dong-yohage doel modeun geos eun keuge dong-yohago
dwileul ieo dong-yoga banbogdoedoda
geunal-ui ma-eumdeul-eun dugeungeoligo
geudeul-ui nundeul-eun mit-eulo cheogjyeoiss eumyeo
jeohuiga sillo ijeon-ui sangtaelo dol-agal su issneunyo lago malhamyeo
uliga bupaehan ppyeodeulman namneun dedo geuleohaneunyo
geulihamyeon geugeos-i sillo ilh-eun gwiloga doelila malhadeola
geuleona geugeos-eun dan hanbeon-i doel geos-ila
geuttae geudeul-eun simpan-eul wihayeo kkaeeona issji anhneunyo
mose-ui iyagiga geudaeege ileuleossneunyo
junimkkeseo seongseuleoun gyegog ttu walo geuleul bulleo
palao-ege gala sillo geuneun modeun yeong-yeog-eul beos-eonan jaini
geuege ileuleo joeag-eulo buteoseuseuloleul cheong-gyeolke hagoja haneunyo
geulihamyeon naega dangsin-eul junimkkelo indohayeo julini dangsin-eun geu bunman-eul dulyeowo halago hala
geulaeseo moseneun geuege keun yejeung-eul boyeossdeola
geuleona palaoneun geu jinlileul geoyeoghago omanhae hayeoss-eumyeo
deung-eul dolligo seodulleo tteona
salamdeul-eul bulleo moa solichyeo malhagil
naega gajang nop-i issneun neohui junim-ila hayeoss-euni
hananim-eun geuege naesewa hyeon se-ui beol-eul naelisyeossneunila
sillo i an-eneun hananim-eul dulyeowohaneun jadeul-eul wihan gyohun-i iss nola
neohuileul changjohaneun geos-i deo eolyeobneunyo animyeon geubun-i se-usin ha neul-igessneunyo
hananim-eun haneul-eul gajang nop-i dusigo geogie jilseowa onjeonham-eul dusyeossnola
geubun-eun bam-eul eodubge dusa bich-eul dusyeossnola
daejileul dusidoe neolbdalahge pyeol chisieo
geugos-eulo buteo mulgwa chomog-eul saengsanke hasyeoss-eumyeo
sandeul-eul dusidoe onjeonhage go jeonghasyeoss-euni
neohuiwa gachugdeul-ege yuyongke hagi wihaeseola
geuleona dae jaeang-i dagaol ttae
geunal-eun ingan-i haenghan geosdeul-eul hoesanghaneun nal-imyeo
jiog-i boneun ja ap-e natanalttae
omanhamyeo bulsinhago
hyeonse-ui salmman-eul joh-ahaessdeon ja deul-egeneun
geojujiga buljiog-i doel geos-ila
geuleona junim-ap-e seoneun geos-eul dulyeowohago jeosoghan yogmangdeullobuteo jasin-eul jajehayeossdeon jadeul-egeneun
geojujiga cheongug-i doel geos-ila
geudeul-eun geuttaega eonje iss-eul geos-inyago geudaeege jilmunhana
geugeos-eul eongeubhaneun geos-i geudae ege gwangyedoeneun il-inyo
jongmal-eun geudae junimman asineun geos-eulo
geudaeneun geugeos-eul dulyeowo haneun ja-ege gyeong-gohaneun gyeong-goja-e bulgwahanila
geugeos-eul boneun nal geudeul-eun jeonyeog-ina achimsigan-ui jeongdo meomun geos gat-i neukkyeojil geos-ila
